name: Zombie Corp.
description:
Start your zombie invasion to accumulate meat. With meat you can create even more zombies to boost the progression of an invasion and thus meat production. 

Zombies are getting prepared and sent away in a dispatcher. The meat get shipped back in upgradeable transporter. Further more meat is used to enhance your zombie production in many ways and eventually with aim for new stronger zombies.


How to Play
  • Tap the zombie button to generate zombies
  • Zombies generate meat
  • Buy upgrades and bigger buildings with your meat income
Key Feautures
  • Incremental idler game for mobile in 3D (Android)
  • Several cool and impactful zombies to unlock
  • Plenty of different upgrades to research which are divided into tears
  • Upgradeable transport vehicles to move even more meat to your facility
  • An offline battery. Even when you are away your zombies gather meat on their on. But only for a certain amount of time or in other words, as long as the capacity of your battery holds. Entering your facility will automatically refill your batteries
  • Unlock new zombies with bigger meat production as your facility gains value
